definition: house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
to take a hotel room/to rent a room

sentences.english: One flat can accommodate a family of five.
sentences.chinese: 一套房间可供五口之家居住。

sentences.english: He burst into the room red-faced and out of breath .
sentences.chinese: 他冲进房间，脸色通红，气喘吁吁。

sentences.english: I've been keeping my room as neat as a pin, and the yard is always ship-shape.
sentences.chinese: 我一直保持房间井然有序，院子也是修得井井有条的。

sentences.english: He jazzed up the room with some bright red curtains.
sentences.chinese: 他用一些鲜红的窗帘将房间装饰得更具生气。

sentences.english: Please tell the boy not barge about the room.
sentences.chinese: 请叫那男孩别在房间里乱碰乱撞。

sentences.english: The mother tiptoed into the room for fear that she should wake up her sleeping baby.
sentences.chinese: 母亲踮起脚尖走进房间，惟恐惊醒正在熟睡的宝宝。

sentences.english: Next door, Chueh-min struck a match and lit the oil lamp.
sentences.chinese: 在隔壁房间里觉民把火柴擦燃，点了灯。

sentences.english: In an Interior Tunnel/Wall Outside Scylla Hallway, Sucre is continuing to drill.
sentences.chinese: 在锡拉房间的墙外，苏克雷正在给墙钻孔。

sentences.english: You can find the information around this hotel from the information card in your room.
sentences.chinese: 有关本饭店的所有信息都在房间的信息卡上。

sentences.english: She sat only in the boy's room.
sentences.chinese: 她一个人独坐在儿子的房间里。

sentences.english: Make sure that the room you're studying in is not too cold or too warm.
sentences.chinese: 确保学习的房间不要太冷或太温暖。

sentences.english: They lived a room facing the north thirty years ago.
sentences.chinese: 三十年前，他住在一个朝北的房间里。

sentences.english: The room ha great importould like closet. You can put your totes in it.
sentences.chinese: 房间里有一个很大的壁橱，你能够把你的行李放出来。

sentences.english: The landlord put a new stove in my room.
sentences.chinese: 房东在我房间里放了一个新暖炉。

sentences.english: Laughing and talking, they went to the room.
sentences.chinese: 他们又说又笑地走进了房间。

sentences.english: I watch her twirl off across the room, her tutu tied on over blue jeans.
sentences.chinese: 我看着她把短裙套在蓝色牛崽裤上在房间里转游。

definition: drawing room (room for arriving guests)/living room/CL:間|间[jian1]
